export

@RequestMapping(value="/export/{grammarId}",
                method=GET,
                produces="text/plain;charset=UTF-8")
@ResponseBody
public String export(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                 @PathVariable
                                                 Long grammarId)
Export given grammar into text/plain file named export.xml.

Parameters:
response - HTTP response used for HTTP header manipulation.
grammarId - ID of grammar stated for export.
Returns:
Response body - UTF-8 encoded text/plain file named export.xml.
